Ugandan.t: n. 乌干达人\na. 乌干达(人)的

Ugaritic.t: a. 具有古代(叙利亚的)乌加里特城特征的, 乌加里特人的, 乌加里特语的

ugb.t: [医][=undecalcified granulated bone]未脱钙（异体）骨颗粒

ugc.t: abbr. ultrasonic grating constant 超声光栅常数; unity grain crossover 统一粮食切割

uge.t: [医][=urogenital sinus epithelium]泌尿生殖窦上皮

ugg.t: abbr. 色氨酸；保暖鞋品牌名（来自澳大利亚）

ugg boots.t: The name says it all. Some really UGGly boots that come in all different colors. Commonly worn with 4 inch skirts by girls with close to zero self-esteem.\n> Hey Jenny, those are some nice boots. What, are you going mountain climbing after school?\n

uggest.t: (ug 的最高级) abbr. 地下（underground）

ugging.t: (ug 的现在分词) abbr. 地下（underground）

uggs.t: Boots with suede outsides and sheepskin insides. Usually used in snowy and cold regions, but now is associated with miniskirts and beach towns.\n> Look at that pigeon! She's wearing her uggs and miniskirt! Gross!\n

ughs.t: (ugh 的复数) interj. 咄!, 啊!, 呸!

ugi.t: abbr. upper gastrointestinal 上端肠胃

ugib.t: abbr. upper gastrointestinal bleeding 上胃肠道出血

UGK.t:
Under Ground Kings

West Charlotte 4 Life
> That new track, bend over, by ugk is ill

Ugli.t: n. 牙买加丑橘（商标名称）

uglies.t: (ugly 的复数) a. 丑陋的, 邪恶的, 险恶的, 不祥的\nn. 丑陋的人(或物)

uglified.t: v. 弄成难看, 丑化( uglify的过去式和过去分词 )

uglifies.t: vt. 弄成难看, 丑化（uglify的第三人称单数形式）

uglifruit.t: n. 牙买加丑橘（商标名称）

uglify.t: vt. 使丑, 弄成难看, 丑化

uglifying.t: v. 弄成难看, 丑化( uglify的现在分词 )

uglily.t: adv. 丑陋地, 难看地

ugly.t: a. 丑陋的, 邪恶的, 险恶的, 不祥的\nn. 丑陋的人(或物)

ugly cry.t:
A type of crying that can feel really good and really bad at the same time.  The ugly cry can occur after a severe tragedy in one's life, or simply for no reason at all. You know you're doing the ugly cry when you lose COMPLETE CONTROL of all of the muscles in your face, start heaving and making awkward sounds (even though you are trying really hard to be silent), and start leaking fluids from every opening on your face from your hairline to your chin (yes, this includes the mouth). Without a doubt, by the time you are through with your ugly cry episode (if it was genuine) it will look as though you are a homeless person with pink eye who got punched a few times in the face and was hit my a monsoon; this is completely normal (and generally the time to call up a good friend).
> Johnny's mom just died, and when he tried to tell me about her, he broke into the ugly cry instead.
> No movie can make you ugly cry like My Dog Skip.

ugly customer.t: [法] 难以对付的家伙, 可畏之人, 难处之人

ugly duckling syndrome.t: Beautiful people who didn't get pretty until high school or later, and were nice because they were ugly. The niceness carries over through life.\n> She's got ugly ducking syndrome.\n

ugly fact of life.t: [法] 生活中的丑闻, 阴暗面

ugly rumour.t: [法] 可怕的谣言, 不堪入耳的谣言

Ugly Sleep.t: Acquired during the deepest stages of a much-needed restful night; when you're so sleep, you sleep through alarms, often with mouth ajar, face planted against the sheets.\n> I tried to wake you up in time for the bus but you were in a deep ugly sleep. I couldn't bring myself to interrupt\n

ugm.t: abbr. underwater-launched guided missile 水下发射的导弹

ugma.t: abbr. Uniform Gifts to Minors Act <予未成年者赠品统一法案>

ugms.t: (ugm 的复数) abbr. underwater-launched guided missile 水下发射的导弹

ugpa.t: abbr. undergraduate grade-point average <美>本科大学生平均积分点

Ugrian.t: a. 乌戈尔人的, 乌戈尔语的

Ugric.t: a. 乌戈尔人的, 乌戈尔语的

ugsome.t: a. <苏格兰><古>可怕的, 讨厌的

uguu.t:
This expression came from the H-game (PC)/PS2/DC/anime [Kanon]. Ayu Tsukimiya's line (and probably the most famous throughout Kanon). This is her expression when she moans, or whines (like eeeehh, but more original).

Darn though. She had a sad story. One of my few favorites besides Nayuki.
> Ayu: I'm cooking cookies.
> Yuuichi: I bet they'll taste terrible.
> Ayu: Uguu! I've learned how to bake from Akiko-san!
> Yuuichi: You can't learn how to bake with just watching in a day..
> ..although I'll eat them if you manage to make them look good.
> Ayu: Really?! Then I'll do my best!

ugv.t: abbr. unmanned ground vehicle 无人驾驶地面车辆
